content: 2 of which 18 sts before m1 25 sts and working each shadow wrap stitch pair as between m1 and m2 and 17 sts after m2 one stitch call them cherry blossoms page 3/8 heel back shaping on needle 1 work according to chart a sts 1- 36 on appropriate row after finishing chart a row 76 proceed to row 77-92 on needle 2 work the heel back shaping as follows round 1 work the first 14 sts according to chart a sts 37-50 on appropriate row work the next 4 sts in pin stripe pattern starting with mc slip m1 ssk with mc and work the established heel flap pattern until 2 sts remain before m2 do not start a new flower motif if less than 23 sts remain between m1 and m2 but work appropriate pin stripe pattern instead k2tog with mc and slip m2 work the next 4 sts in pin stripe pattern starting with cc finally work the remaining 13 sts on photo emma karvonen needle 2 according to chart a sts 60-72 on appropriate row round 2 work the first 14 sts according to chart next work as follows depending on whether a sts 37-50 on appropriate row work the you have finished chart a row 92 with more next 4 sts in pin stripe pattern starting with than 3 sts between m1 and m2 or not mc slip m1 k1 with mc and work the 3 sts between m1 and m2 and chart a row established heel flap pattern until 1 st remains 92 not reached yet work as previously before m2 do not start a new flower motif if described for round 1 to m1 rm sk2p with mc less than 23 sts remain between the markers and rm work the remaining 17 sts as but work appropriate pin stripe pattern previously described for round 1 instead k1 with mc and slip m2 work the next 4 sts in pin stripe pattern starting with 3 or more sts between m1 and m2 and chart cc finally work the remaining 13 sts on a row 92 just finished continue to work the needle 2 according to chart a sts 60-72 on heel back shaping as previously described for appropriate row round 1 and round 2 but use chart b2 instead of chart a in case you finish chart b2 row 103 repeat rnds 1 and 2 on needle 2 until while still working the heel back shaping - either there are 3 sts left between proceed to chart c1 c2 c3 or c4 depending m1 and m2 and you have just on the desired leg length on the last decrease finished row 2 and you haven t round i e when 3 sts remain between m1 and reached chart a row 92 yet m2 work sk2p with mc between m1 and m2 - or you have just finished chart a row and remove markers 92 with 3 or more stitches between m1 and m2
